rank of the MPI process

size of receive buffer

maximal size of MPI buffer for

whether MPI buffers for communication of
how many secondary elements (in ints) will be received from each rank
how many secondary elements (in ints) will be sent to each rank
offset in the MPI receive buffer (in

detaileddescription.para: ints) at which elements received from each rank will be written

briefdescription.para: offset in the MPI send buffer (in ints)

detaileddescription.para: from which elements send to each rank will be read

briefdescription.para: Prepare manager for operation.

detaileddescription.para: After this method has completed, the manager should be completely initialized and "ready for action".

simplesect.para: Initialization of any given manager may depend on other managers having been initialized before. KernelManager::initialize() is responsible for calling the initialization routines on the specific managers in correct order.

briefdescription.para: Take down manager after operation.

detaileddescription.para: After this method has completed, all dynamic data structures created by the manager shall be deallocated and containers emptied. Plain variables need not be reset.

simplesect.para: Finalization of any given manager may depend on other managers not having been finalized yet. KernelManager::finalize() is responsible for calling the initialization routines on the specific managers in correct order, i.e., the opposite order of initialize() calls.

briefdescription.para: Return the number of processes used during simulation.

detaileddescription.para: This functions returns the number of processes. Since each process has the same number of threads, the total number of threads is given by get_num_threads()*get_num_processes().

briefdescription.para: Set the number of processes state variable.
Get rank of MPI process.
Return the process id for a given virtual process.

detaileddescription.para: The real process' id of a virtual process is defined by the relation: p = (vp mod P), where P is the total number of processes.

briefdescription.para: Finalize MPI communication (needs to be separate from MPIManager::finalize when compiled with MUSIC since spikes can arrive and handlers called here)
If MPI is available, this method calls MPI_Abort with the exitcode.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::vector< unsigned int > &send_buffer, std::vector< unsigned int > &recv_buffer, std::vector< int > &displacements)
memberdef.name: communicate

briefdescription.para: communicate (on-grid) if compiled without MPI
communicate (off-grid) if compiled without MPI

memberdef.argsstring: (std::vector< unsigned long > &send_buffer, std::vector< unsigned long > &recv_buffer, std::vector< int > &displacements)
memberdef.name: communicate

briefdescription.para: Equal across all ranks.

simplesect.para: true if values across all ranks are equal, false otherwise or if any rank passes -inf as value

briefdescription.para: Returns total size of MPI buffer for communication of connections.
Returns size of MPI buffer for connections divided by number of processes.
Returns total size of MPI buffer for communication of spikes.
Returns size of MPI buffer for spikes divided by number of processes.
Returns total size of MPI send buffer for communication of secondary events.
Returns total size of MPI recv buffer for communication of secondary events.

memberdef.argsstring: (std::vector< D > &send_buffer, std::vector< D > &recv_buffer, const unsigned int send_recv_count)
memberdef.name: communicate_Alltoall

briefdescription.para: Benchmark communication time of different MPI methods.

detaileddescription.para: The methods time_communicate* can be used to benchmark the timing of different MPI communication methods.

briefdescription.para: Increases the size of the MPI buffer for communication of connections if it needs to be increased.

detaileddescription.para: Returns whether the size was changed.

briefdescription.para: Increases the size of the MPI buffer for communication of spikes if it needs to be increased.

detaileddescription.para: Returns whether the size was changed.

briefdescription.para: Decreases the size of the MPI buffer for communication of spikes if it can be decreased.
Returns whether MPI buffers for communication of connections are adaptive.
Returns whether MPI buffers for communication of spikes are adaptive.
Sets the recvcounts parameter of Alltoallv for communication of secondary events, i.e., the number of elements (in ints) to recv from the corresponding rank.
Returns the recvcounts parameter of Alltoallv for communication of secondary events, i.e., the number of elements (in ints) to recv from source_rank.
Returns the rdispls parameter of Alltoallv for communication of secondary events, i.e., the offset in the MPI buffer where elements from source_rank are written.
Returns the number of elements (in ints) to be sent to target_rank.
Returns the send displacement of elements (in ints) to be sent to rank target_rank.
Returns where the done marker is located in the MPI send buffer for target_rank.
Returns where the done marker is located in the MPI recv buffer for source_rank.
